Group.Title: Chart
Group.Description: The Chart control can plot over 30 chart types ranging from line charts to specialized financial charts.

Feature.Name: GradientChart
Feature.Title: Gradient Color
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the Gradient feature.

Feature.Name: Trendlines
Feature.Title: Trendlines
Feature.Description: This sample showcases how to add trendlines to the chart.

Feature.Name: AnnotationCustomization
Feature.Title: Annotation
Feature.Description: Annotations used to display metadata about a chart or series at a specific point of interest in the plotting area.

Feature.Name: AxisCrossing
Feature.Title: Axis Crossing
Feature.Description: AxisCrossing feature changes the location at which the x-axis crosses the y-axis and vice versa.

Feature.Name: Category
Feature.Title: Category Axis
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the use of category axis in chart. Category axis is an indexed based axis that plots values based on its index in the data source.

Feature.Name: Date
Feature.Title: DateTime Axis
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the use of date time axis.

Feature.Name: Numerical
Feature.Title: Numerical Axis
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the use of numerical axis in chart. Numerical axis is used to plot numeric values.

Feature.Name: Logarithmic
Feature.Title: Logarithmic Axis
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the use of logarithmic axis in chart.

Feature.Name: StackedDoughnut
Feature.Title: Stacked Doughnut
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the use of stacked doughnut in chart.

Feature.Name: MultipleAxis
Feature.Title: Multiple Axes
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the use of multiple axes in chart.

Feature.Name: StripLines
Feature.Title: Strip Lines
Feature.Description: Strip lines are used to highlight specific range in the chart. They can be horizontal or vertical, and also be made to optionally repeat at specific intervals.

Feature.Name: Trackball
Feature.Title: Trackball
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the trackball feature. Trackball displays the tooltip for the data points that are closer to the point where you touch on the chart area.

Feature.Name: TooltipCustomization
Feature.Title: Tooltip
Feature.Description: This sample showcases tooltip capabilities in chart. Tooltip feature is used to show information about the segment, when you tap on the segment.

Feature.Name: DataMarkerCustomization
Feature.Title: Data Marker
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the customization of data markers. Data markers are used to provide information about the data points to the user.

Feature.Name: DataPointSelection
Feature.Title: Data Point Selection
Feature.Description: Selection allows you to highlight a data point. You can select a data point by tapping on it.

Feature.Name: ZoomingandPanning
Feature.Title: Zooming and Panning
Feature.Description: This sample showcases the zooming and panning capabilities of chart.

Feature.Name: TechnicalIndicators
Feature.Title: Technical Indicators
Feature.Description: Technical indicators are the base for technical analysis, which is used to determine the future of financial, stock or economic trends.

Feature.Name: AutoScrolling
Feature.Title: Auto Scrolling
Feature.Description: This sample demonstrates the automatic scrolling of axis during real time updates.

Feature.Name: LiveUpdate
Feature.Title: Live Update
Feature.Description: This sample illustrates the performance of SfChart in real time update scenario.

Feature.Name: VerticalChart
Feature.Title: Vertical Chart
Feature.Description: This sample showcases vertical charts feature.

Group.Title: DataGrid
Group.Description: The data grid control is a high-performance grid component that is used to display the data in a tabular format.

Sample.Name: GridGettingStarted
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the SfDataGrid with ObservableCollection as the data source.

Sample.Name: Sorting
Sample.Title: Sorting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the sorting capabilities of data in SfDataGrid that allows you to sort against one or more columns and also provides Tri-state sorting functionality.

Sample.Name: Filtering
Sample.Title: Filtering
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the filtering capabilities of data in SfDataGrid.

Sample.Name: FrozenView
Sample.Title: Frozen View
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the freeze panes capability of SfDataGrid which provides support to freeze rows at the top and columns at the left.

Sample.Name: Grouping
Sample.Title: Grouping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the grouping capability of data in SfDataGrid.

Sample.Name: Selection
Sample.Title: Selection
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the selection capability of SfDataGrid which provides selection mode options like Single, Multiple, SingleDeselect and None.

Sample.Name: Editing
Sample.Title: Editing
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the editing capabilities of SfDataGrid which provides support to edit GridTextColumn, GridNumericColumn, GridPickerColumn and GridDateTimeColumn.

Sample.Name: Formatting
Sample.Title: Formatting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the columns capability of SfDataGrid which provides support for text and UserCellType columns.

Sample.Name: DragAndDrop
Sample.Title: Drag And Drop
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the column and row drag and drop capabilities of SfDataGrid which provide user flexibility when interacting with the grid rows and grid columns.

Sample.Name: ContextMenu
Sample.Title: ContextMenu
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the ability to show a context menu using SfPopup in the SfDataGrid with options for sorting and grouping.

Sample.Name: UnboundColumn
Sample.Title: Unbound Views
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the unbound column and unbound row capability of SfDataGrid. Unbound columns / rows are extra columns / rows that are generated but do not belong to the data source.

Sample.Name: Styles
Sample.Title: Styles
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the styling capabilities of SfDataGrid. Styling allows you to change the visual appearance of the SfDataGrid and its inner elements.

Sample.Name: AutoRowHeight
Sample.Title: Auto Row Height
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the auto row height feature of SfDataGrid which renders grid rows based on its content to improve the readability and occurs on-demand basis.

Sample.Name: LoadMore
Sample.Title: Load More
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the load more capability of SfDataGrid that allows you to load a subset of data to the bound data source using built-in UI.

Sample.Name: PullToRefresh
Sample.Title: Pull To Refresh
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the pull-to-refresh capability of SfDataGrid which allows you to refresh the data source upon pull-to-refresh action.

Sample.Name: Paging
Sample.Title: Paging
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the paging capabilities of SfDataGrid using SfDataPager which allows you to load the data from the data source in an efficient way.

Sample.Name: Swiping
Sample.Title: Swiping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the swiping capabilities of SfDataGrid which allow you to load swipe views and associate them with custom actions.

Sample.Name: RenderingDynamicData
Sample.Title: Rendering Dynamic Data
Sample.Description: This sample illustrates the frequent updates that occur in random cells across the Grid while keeping processor usage to a minimum in the SfDataGrid.

Sample.Name: IncrementalLoading
Sample.Title: Incremental Loading
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the incremental loading capability of SfDataGrid in which a subset of data is fetched from the services in runtime when reaching the end of the list.

Sample.Name: Exporting
Sample.Title: Exporting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the excel and pdf exporting capabilities of SfDataGrid. SfDataGrid also provides you various customization options for exporting.

Group.Title: TreeView
Group.Description: TreeView is a data-oriented control that displays data in a hierarchical structure with expanding and collapsing nodes.

Sample.Name: TreeGettingStarted
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the basic view of SfTreeView with some nodes added in unbound mode.

Sample.Name: TreeNodeImages
Sample.Title: Node with Images
Sample.Description: This sample showcases tree nodes with images.

Sample.Name: TreeSelection
Sample.Title: Selection
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the selection feature of SfTreeView.

Group.Title: AutoComplete
Group.Description: AutoComplete functionality provides suggestions to the user while typing.

Group.Title: ComboBox
Group.Description: The SfComboBox control allows the user to select an item either type a value directly or select a value from the list.

Group.Title: CircularGauge
Group.Description: Visualize numeric data using circular gauge control.

Group.Title: Schedule
Group.Description: The Schedule control is used to schedule and manage the appointments through an intuitive user interface to plan and manage the events or appointments in an efficient way.

Sample.Name: ScheduleGettingStarted
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: Showcases a simple schedule with data source displayed in day, workweek, week, and month views.

Sample.Name: ScheduleTypes
Sample.Title: Schedule View
Sample.Description: Showcases the date navigation support with appointment editing such as start time, end time, subject, time zone, and more.

Sample.Name: Recurrence
Sample.Title: Recurrence
Sample.Description: Showcases the recurring appointments.

Sample.Name: Timetable
Sample.Title: Timetable
Sample.Description: Showcases the working hours with blocking timeslots.

Sample.Name: AgendaView
Sample.Title: Agenda View
Sample.Description: Showcases the agenda view support of schedule where specific date appointments can be viewed below the month view.

Sample.Name: DragDrop
Sample.Title: Drag and Drop
Sample.Description: Showcases the capability of rescheduling appointment through drag-and-drop operations.

Sample.Name: Customization
Sample.Title: Customization
Sample.Description: Showcases the capability of appointment customization using custom view.

Sample.Name: Configuration
Sample.Title: Configuration
Sample.Description: Showcases the separation of working and non-working hours with different colors with blocking timeslots in day, week, and workweek views. It shows the blackout of a particular date and week number support in month view.

Sample.Name: Localization
Sample.Title: Localization
Sample.Description: Showcases the localization support of schedule.

Group.Title: ImageEditor
Group.Description: ImageEditor allows user to editing the images like adding shapes, text and rotating.

Group.Title: PDFViewer
Group.Description: PDF viewer is a new control that allows PDF documents to be viewed within your Xamarin Android application.

Group.Title: Diagram
Group.Description: The diagram control allows to create different types of diagrams such as flow charts, use case diagrams, workflow process diagrams, and more.

Group.Title: TabView
Group.Description: Tab view control allows the user to navigate and switch between tabs

Group.Title: SegmentedControl
Group.Description: The segmented control provides option to choose from a linear set of two or more segments, each of which functions as a mutually exclusive button.

Group.Title: Popup
Group.Description: SfPopupLayout allows the user to display an alert message with the customizable buttons or load any desired view inside the pop-up.

Sample.Name: PopupGettingStarted
Sample.Title: Onboard Help
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the SfPopup used as overlays to instruct the users using the app for the first time.

Sample.Name: PopupCustomizations
Sample.Title: Popup Customization
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the various layouts of the SfPopup that comes in handy in a sleek ticket booking app.

Sample.Name: DetailsView
Sample.Title: Popup Menu
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the relative positioning capalitites of the SfPopup that comes in handy in a dialer application.

Group.Title: NavigationDrawer
Group.Description: NavigationDrawer is a sliding panel menu that comes out from the edge of the window and allows to have the contents in a hidden panel.

Group.Title: Carousel
Group.Description: Carousel control allows navigating through image data in an interactive way so that they can be viewed or selected

Group.Title: DataForm
Group.Description: The DataForm control helps to develop various forms such as login, reservation and data entry, etc.It displays properties in list or grid layout.

Sample.Name: DataFormGettingStarted
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: This sample showcases simple DataForm by loading a set of fields.

Sample.Name: ContactForm
Sample.Title: Contact Form
Sample.Description: This sample showcases read only and layout customization capabilities of DataForm.

Group.Title: Calendar
Group.Description: Calendar is a user interface component that displays Gregorian calendar. This component allows the user to select a date. It also provides a gesture-friendly UI to perform operations such as navigations, events, and more.

Sample.Name: CalendarGettingStarted
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: Showcases different view modes support: month and year views.

Sample.Name: CalendarBlackOutDates
Sample.Title: Blackout dates
Sample.Description: Showcases the specific date blackout capability of calendar.

Sample.Name: InlineEvents
Sample.Title: Inline Events
Sample.Description: Showcases the inline events in inline view mode and agenda view mode in a specific date of the month.

Sample.Name: CalendarLocalization
Sample.Title: Localization
Sample.Description: Showcases localization and globalization.

Sample.Name: CalendarConfiguration
Sample.Title: Customization
Sample.Description: Showcases the month cell customization using custom view with restriction support to navigate beyond the specified minimum and maximum dates.

Group.Title: NumericTextBox
Group.Description: NumericTextBox is an advanced version of the EditText control that restricts input to numeric values

Group.Title: Picker
Group.Description: A SfPicker control allows user to pick an item among a list of Items that can be customize or template with custom view.

Group.Title: MaskedEdit
Group.Description: The MaskedEdit control allows the user to restrict the input to certain types of characters/text/numbers using a mask pattern.

Group.Title: CheckBox
Group.Description: The check box is a selection control that allows users to select one or more options from a set.

Group.Title: NumericUpDown
Group.Description: Similar to NumericTextBox control, NumericUpDown control restricts input to numeric values and provides up, down repeat buttons to increase or decrease numerical values

Group.Title: Kanban
Group.Description: The Kanban control is an efficient way to visualize a workflow at each stage of its completion.

Group.Title: RangeNavigator
Group.Description: The Range Navigator control provides an intuitive interface for selecting a smaller range from a larger collection.

Group.Title: LinearGauge
Group.Description: Visualize numeric data using linear gauge control.

Group.Title: DigitalGauge
Group.Description: Visualize numeric data using digital gauge control.

Group.Title: SunburstChart
Group.Description: Sunburst Chart is useful for visualizing hierarchical data.

Group.Title: Maps
Group.Description: Maps provides a graphical representation of geographical data. It is used to represent the statistical data of a particular geographical area on Earth.

Group.Title: TreeMap
Group.Description: TreeMap is ideal for visualizing large amounts of data. TreeMap holds a set of nested nodes to display hierarchical data.

Group.Title: Barcode
Group.Description: Barcode provides a perfect approach to encode texts by using supported symbol types that comprises one dimensional Barcodes and two dimensional Barcodes.

Group.Title: SparkLine
Group.Description: The sparkline control presents trends and variations associated with a measurement, such as average temperature or stock market activity, in a simple, light-weighted, condensed form.

Group.Title: XlsIO
Group.Description: XlsIO is a .NET class library that can read, write and modify Microsoft Excel documents.

Sample.Name: CreateSpreadsheetPage
Sample.Title: Create Spreadsheet
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports to create an Excel document without any dependency of Microsoft Excel in few lines of code.

Sample.Name: ChartsPage
Sample.Title: Charts
Sample.Description: Create and manipulate all types of Excel charts with elements like chart title, legend, axis title, data labels, line styles, etc.

Sample.Name: ImportCollectionObjectsPage
Sample.Title: Collection Objects
Sample.Description: Collection objects usually holds a set of instance variables or properties, also known as attributes. XlsIO allows to import data directly from Collection objects.

Sample.Name: ImportNestedCollectionPage
Sample.Title: Import Nested CollectionPage
Sample.Description: XlsIO allows to import data directly from Nested Collection with Layout and Group options.

Sample.Name: ImportHtmlTablePage
Sample.Title: Import HTML Table
Sample.Description: XlsIO allows to import HTML table to worksheet.

Sample.Name: DataTablePage
Sample.Title: DataTable
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports import/export DataTable from/to an Excel worksheet.

Sample.Name: PerformancePage
Sample.Title: Performance
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports performance optimization for large data.

Sample.Name: ExcelToPDFPage
Sample.Title: Excel to PDF
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports conversion of Excel to PDF.

Sample.Name: ExcelToJSONPage
Sample.Title: Excel To JSON
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports conversion of Excel to JSON.

Sample.Name: FiltersPage
Sample.Title: Filters
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports data filtering based on text, date and custom options.

Sample.Name: FindAndReplace
Sample.Title: Find and Replace
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports to find the range of a value in the worksheet and replace it with a new value.

Sample.Name: FormulasPage
Sample.Title: Formulas
Sample.Description: XlsIO has support to read, write and calculate formulas. The built-in calculation engine can quickly evaluate formula cell values at runtime.

Sample.Name: ImportXMLPage
Sample.Title: Import XML Data
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports single line of code to import XML data into an Excel worksheet.

Sample.Name: WorksheetToImagePage
Sample.Title: Worksheet To Image
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports conversion of worksheets to images.

Sample.Name: WorksheetToHTMLPage
Sample.Title: Worksheet To HTML
Sample.Description: XlsIO supports conversion of worksheets to HTML pages.

Group.Title: DocIO
Group.Description: DocIO is a .NET class library that can read, write and modify Microsoft Word documents.

Sample.Name: MarkdownToWord
Sample.Title: Markdown to Word
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to convert the Markdown file to Word document using .NET Word (DocIO) library.

Sample.Name: TableOfContents
Sample.Title: Table of Content
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to insert and update the Table of Contents (TOC) in a Word document using Essential DocIO.

Sample.Name: EncryptAndDecrypt
Sample.Title: Encrypt and Decrypt
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt the Word document using Essential DocIO.

Sample.Name: TrackChanges
Sample.Title: Track Changes
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to accept or reject the tracked changes in the Word document using Essential DocIO.

Group.Title: Presentation
Group.Description: Presentation is a .NET class library that can read, write and modify Microsoft PowerPoint files (*.pptx only).

Sample.Name: GettingStartedPresentation
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a PowerPoint presentation by adding text with simple text formatting.

Sample.Name: PPTXToImage
Sample.Title: PPTX To Image
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to convert the PowerPoint slide to an image.

Sample.Name: PPTXToPDF
Sample.Title: PPTX To PDF
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to convert a PowerPoint presentation to PDF.

Sample.Name: WriteProtection
Sample.Title: Write Protection
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to set a write protection for a PowerPoint presentation.

Sample.Name: ImagesPresentation
Sample.Title: Images
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to add an image in PowerPoint presentation.

Sample.Name: SlidesPresentation
Sample.Title: Slides
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a slide with predefined layouts, like Microsoft PowerPoint.

Sample.Name: TablesPresentation
Sample.Title: Tables
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a table with specified number of rows and columns in PowerPoint presentation for displaying tabular data.

Sample.Name: ChartsPresentation
Sample.Title: Charts
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a pie chart in PowerPoint presentation.

Sample.Name: CommentsPresentation
Sample.Title: Comments
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to add comments in PowerPoint presentation for reviewing and updating feedbacks.

Sample.Name: ConnectorsPresentation
Sample.Title: Connectors
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to insert a connectors in a PowerPoint slide.

Sample.Name: OLEObjectPresentation
Sample.Title: OLE Object
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to insert and extract a OLE Object in PowerPoint presentation.

Sample.Name: HeaderAndFooterPresentation
Sample.Title: Header And Footer
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to insert a header and footer in a PowerPoint presentation.

Sample.Name: CreateAnimationPresentation
Sample.Title: Create Animation
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create animation in PowerPoint presentation

Sample.Name: ModifyAnimationPresentation
Sample.Title: Modify Animation
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to modify the animation in PowerPoint presentation

Sample.Name: SlideTransitionPresentation
Sample.Title: Slide Transition
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create the transition effects in PowerPoint presentation slides

Group.Title: PDF
Group.Description: PDF is a .NET class library that can create and modify PDF files.

Sample.Name: GettingStartedPDF
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a simple PDF document with text and images.

Sample.Name: Barcode
Sample.Title: Barcode
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create various barcode in a PDF document.

Sample.Name: Stamping
Sample.Title: Stamping
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to stamp or watermark an existing PDF document.

Sample.Name: Booklet
Sample.Title: Booklet
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a booklet from an existing PDF document.

Sample.Name: TableFeatures
Sample.Title: Table Features
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create borderless tables in a PDF document.

Sample.Name: ImageInsertion
Sample.Title: Image Insertion
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to insert images in a PDF document.

Sample.Name: DigitalSignature
Sample.Title: Digital Signature
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how a PDF document can be secured with certificates and signed with either standard or author signatures. Now added the support for Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) to sign the PDF document.

Sample.Name: DigitalSignatureValidation
Sample.Title: Digital Signature Validation
Sample.Description: This sample illustrates how to validate the digitally signed PDF document signature.

Sample.Name: Encryption
Sample.Title: Encryption
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to create a secure PDF document.

Sample.Name: RTLSupport
Sample.Title: RTL Text
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates drawing right-to-left language text in the PDF document.

Sample.Name: Conformance
Sample.Title: PDF Conformance
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates various PDF conformance support in Essential PDF.

Sample.Name: ZugFerd
Sample.Title: ZUGFeRD Invoice
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how o create a ZUGFeRD PDF document.

Sample.Name: OpenTypeFont
Sample.Title: OpenType Font
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates how to draw a text with OpenType font in a PDF document.

Sample.Name: HtmlTextElement
Sample.Title: Html Text Element
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates drawing HTML text element in the PDF document.

Group.Title: RadialMenu
Group.Description: RadialMenu displays menu in a circular layout. It can expose more menu items in the same space than traditional menus

Group.Title: PullToRefresh
Group.Description: SfPullToRefresh is a pullable panel which on pulling down the main content in order to refresh the data in the application.

Group.Title: ProgressBar
Group.Description: Customizable visual indicating the progress of the operation.

Group.Title: BusyIndicator
Group.Description: Animated controls can be used to indicate busy status during application loading, data processing/validation, etc

Group.Title: Rating
Group.Description: Rating control provides the number of stars that represents a rating.

Group.Title: Rotator
Group.Description: Rotator is a data control used to display image data and navigate through them. The images can be selected either by Thumbnail or by Dots support.

Group.Title: RangeSlider
Group.Description: RangeSlider control allows you to select the range of value within the specified minimum and maximum limits. he range can be selected by moving the Thumb control along a track

Group.Title: DataSource
Group.Description: The DataSource is a non-UI component that consumes raw data and processes data operations such as sorting, filtering, and grouping.

Sample.Name: DataSourceGettingStarted
Sample.Title: Getting Started
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the DataSource control bound with ObservableCollection.

Sample.Name: DataSourceSorting
Sample.Title: Sorting
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the sorting capabilities of the DataSource control.

Sample.Name: DataSourceGrouping
Sample.Title: Grouping
Sample.Description: This sample showcases the grouping capabilities of the DataSource control.

Group.Title: Calculate
Group.Description: Calculate is an independent class library that allows you to provide extensive calculation support to your business objects.
